sentences.en: Come on, let’s wipe that muck off your face.
sentences.cn: 过来，我们把你脸上的那个脏东西擦掉。

sentences.en: Course residents are expected to muck in and be pre-pared to share rooms.
sentences.cn: 场地附近的居民也将会加入并分享自己的住处。

sentences.en: Do you call that food? I'm not eating that muck!
sentences.cn: 那也能叫做食物 吗 ?我可不吃那行子!

sentences.en: dog muck
sentences.cn: 狗屎

sentences.en: Don't make a muck of the dictionary. It is newly bought.
sentences.cn: 别把字典弄脏了, 这是新买的.

sentences.en: He could smell muck and clean fresh hay.
sentences.cn: 他能闻到粪臭和清新的干草味。

sentences.en: He stood a moment irresolutely prodding the muck in the ditch.
sentences.cn: 他犹豫不决地站了一会儿,用手杖扒拉一阵沟里的脏东西.

sentences.en: Here's how to muck out.
sentences.cn: 就这样清扫。

sentences.en: How can you eat that muck? It looks disgusting.
sentences.cn: 你怎么能吃那玩意？看着就恶心。

sentences.en: I used stable muck as a mulch for my roses.
sentences.cn: 我用厩肥做我玫瑰的护根.

sentences.en: Ian was never afraid to take his coat off and muck in with everybody else.
sentences.cn: 伊恩从不怕甩开膀子和大家一起干活。

sentences.en: If we all muck in we'll soon finish the job.
sentences.cn: 要是我们一起出力,很快就能把活做完.

sentences.en: If we all muck in we'll soon finish the work.
sentences.cn: 如果我们全都加入工作,很快就可以做完.

sentences.en: she really enjoys &B{mucking in with} the lads.
sentences.cn: 她的确喜欢和小伙子们一起干活。

sentences.en: special machinery for spreading muck onto the fields
sentences.cn: 向田里撒肥的特殊机器

sentences.en: The kids were covered in muck.
sentences.cn: 孩子们满身是泥.

sentences.en: This congealed muck was interfering with the filter.
sentences.cn: 这团凝固的污物堵塞了过滤器。

sentences.en: to spread muck on the fields
sentences.cn: 将粪肥撒到地里

sentences.en: we just muck around in training and have a laugh.
sentences.cn: 我们在训练时只是胡闹一通，找找乐罢了。

sentences.en: When she starts talking you'll realize that she's as common as muck.
sentences.cn: 她一开口,你就会明白这人缺乏教养.

sentences.en: Your behavior is causing our reputation to be dragged through the muck.
sentences.cn: 你的行为在玷污我们的名声.

phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式)粗俗；地位低下；卑贱
鬼混：懒散地打发时间；闲逛
(英，非正式)混日子；吊儿郎当瞎混；胡闹
(英， 非正式)（不计地位地）一起工作；同吃同住
(英，非正式)轻率对待（尤指打乱某人的行动或计划）

trans.tran_cn: 污物，污泥，废石，湿粪，秽物
trans.tran_en: waste matter from animals, sometimes put on land to make plants grow better
